revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #35 Belue |image = [[File:Belue.png]] |caption = Cette Baie brillante et colorée est si belle qu'elle vous met l'eau à bouche. Mais son goût est horriblement acide. |growtime = 5h 30m 0s |harvest = 20 baies |replant = 10% |mutation = 0,02% |points = 1 100 |flavor =
*10 épicée *0 sèche *0 sucrée *0 amère *30 acide }}
'''Belue''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding a [[Nomel]] with at least 130, but no more than 160 points of sour and no more than 80 points of all other flavours. The [[Nomel]] will then have a chance to mutate into this berry.
== Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 1 hour 23 mins 20 secs || 2 hours 43 mins 20 secs || 4 hours 1 min 40 secs || 5 hours 30 mins - 11 hours |- !Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:BelueTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:BelueTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:BelueTreeBerry.png|50px]] |}
=== Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 5 hours 30 mins -
11 hours || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 3 hours 40 mins -
7 hours 20 mins || 44 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 2 hours 26 mins 40 secs -
5 hours 53 mins 20 secs || 30 mulch |}
== Flow Chart == [[File:Belue_Flow_Chart.png|250px]]
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations ===
You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Belue berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur.
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Base Formation |- | style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Nomel.png|30px]]

[[Nomel]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | [[File:Nomel.png|30px]]
'''[[Nomel]]''' || [[File:Nomel.png|30px]]
[[Nomel]] |- style="height: 26px;" | [[File:Nomel.png|30px]]
[[Nomel]] || [[File:Nomel.png|30px]]
[[Nomel]] || [[File:Nomel.png|30px]]
[[Nomel]] |}
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Optimized Planting Formation |- | style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Nomel.png|30px]]

==Uses== ===Mutations===
Belue berries can be used to mutate the following berries.
{| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" |- ! Used In !! With |- | [[File:Rowap.png|20px]] [[Rowap]] || - |- |}

{{Infobox Berry |name = #35 Belue |image = [[File:Belue.png]] |caption = This glossy and colorful Berry has a mouthwateringly delicious appearance. However, it is awfully sour. |growtime = 5h 30m 0s |harvest = 20 berries |replant = 10% |mutation = 0.02% |points = 1,100 |flavor =
*10 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *30 sour }}
'''Belue''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding a [[Nomel]] with at least 130, but no more than 160 points of sour and no more than 80 points of all other flavours. The [[Nomel]] will then have a chance to mutate into this berry.
